questions:
1. What is the purpose of this code file?
   - This code file defines a C# class called `AccountStateJson` in the `Ethereum.Test.Base` namespace, which has properties for balance, code, nonce, and storage of an Ethereum account.

2. What is the significance of the SPDX-License-Identifier comment?
   - The SPDX-License-Identifier comment specifies the license under which the code is released. In this case, it is the LGPL-3.0-only license.

3. Why are the properties of the `AccountStateJson` class nullable?
   - The properties are marked as nullable with the `?` symbol because they may not have a value in certain cases, such as when the account has no code or storage.
